channel.title: Basic thing which i have no clue how to do
channel.description: All I need is a quick reply on how to do this, don't tell me i am a noob or go search, because i have and they aren't working. I just need someone to type some php code because i am making a jukebox list and all i want to do is have it go to like http://www.whatever.com/music/music.php?music-id=banana and then it would have a the code to where it would be like <embed src = $music-id & ".mid" loop = "true" autostart = "true" > because it has parse errors and in html it just shows a X box, thankyou for your cooperation. :)

item.title: Basic thing which i have no clue how to do
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Thankyou, i got it to work by taking the ["'music-id"] and puting [“music-id”] because the ’ changed what it meant
But thankyou very much!

item.source: Basic thing which i have no clue how to do

item.title: Basic thing which i have no clue how to do
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

echo ‘<embed src="’.$_GET["‘music-id"].’.mid" loop=“true” autostart=“true”>’;

that should do it i believe

Read full topic
